title: Mobile-Based Short-Intensive Innovation Industrial Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Real-time collaborative learning environment utilizing personal mobile devices, integrated with field-oriented practical applications

learning_goals: Students can apply three or more innovative design methodologies via mobile lecture platforms.
Learners can complete a user-centered product prototype within a week using the PBL (Project-Based Learning) approach.
Teams can derive over 80% of usability improvement strategies for design solutions using a feedback system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
